main_definition: To actively follow, chase, or strive to achieve something with determination.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To seek out and obtain (something desirable)
meanings_and_examples.example: She decided to pursue a career in medicine after volunteering at the local hospital.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To follow or chase someone, usually as an enemy or adversary
meanings_and_examples.example: The police were pursuing the thief who had stolen from several stores in town.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To continue working on a goal with determination and effort
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite facing numerous challenges, he continued to pursue his dream of becoming an author.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To diligently work toward achieving something
meanings_and_examples.example: She is determined to pursue her education and obtain a degree in engineering.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To move forward steadily with purpose or direction
meanings_and_examples.example: The ship continued to pursue its course despite the strong winds and rough seas.
